comments.body: I know it was here before, though why do we have commented out code?

I need to update this method to provide more granular facts data like the previous methods. I started working on this, but I haven't had time to test the API for all scenarios and see what kind of data is returned. These will either be uncommented or removed once I get around to fleshing out this method.

diffHunk:

        obj_rn = obj['aci_rn']
